Package utilities

Class Mailer

java.lang.Object
utilities.Mailer
public class Mailer extends Object
a utility class to send an email using the SMTP protocol and the Google Gmail services
Author:
Ahmed, Amine

  • Method Details

    • bookingMessage

      public static String bookingMessage​(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, Schedule schedule)
      a simple method to create the message to send to the patient after booking an appointment
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient who has booked the appointment
      doctor - the doctor that has been booked from the patient
      schedule - the schedule chosen from the patient
      Returns:
      the message to sent after booking a new appointment

    • cancellationMessage

      public static String cancellationMessage​(Patient patient)
      a simple method to create the message to send to the patient after cancelling an appointment
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient who has cancelled the appointment
      Returns:
      the message to sent after cancelling a new appointment

    • reschedulingMessage

      public static String reschedulingMessage​(Patient patient, Schedule schedule)
      a simple method to create the message to send to the patient after rescheduling an appointment
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient to send the email to
      schedule - the schedule chosen from the patient
      Returns:
      the message to sent after rescheduling a new appointment

    • sendMail

      public static void sendMail​(String recipient, String msg, String subject) throws javax.mail.MessagingException
      Utility method to send an email
      Parameters:
      recipient - represents the email of the person receiving the email
      msg - represents the body of the email
      subject - represents the subject of the email
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - in case sending the message fails
